mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} and PW=#{pw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME=#{name}, PW=#{pw}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email} WHERE ID=#{id}
